title: House with a Good View 2
overview: The hot real estate business diary with three women is revealed! Hyeong-joon, a man who is still unemployed at almost middle age, is urged to work at a real estate company owned by his mother's friend, which himself looks down on in this field. In his first period of work, he immediately changes his opinion after seeing his boss's sexy wife, a company colleague who often teases him, and an innocent and adorable new employee. Now the exploration of the empty house with these hot girls begins!
